name: Schizm
description:
Submission for Brackey's Gamejam 2022.1

Press left CONTROL to warp between the overworld and underworld

Press left SHIFT to attack enemies

Use full screen to view health bar (lol)

We ran out of time to add more but had a lot of fun!

Art by NB_Art.itch.io

Sounds by Forrestcyang.itch.io

Programming and all other aspects by 02hero.itch.io
